title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2171.2 - Grant assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2171.2 - Grant assistance

State Regulations

The grant assistance may be cancelled in whole or in part
for mutual convenience if both parties agree that the project's continuation is
infeasible or would not produce beneficial results commensurate with the
further expenditure of funds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2171.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
